Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed after the execution of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include SW-EIC Major Revision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and the end of case where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision occurs

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and the subsequent occurrence of SW-Reviewer Declined within the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time until SW-Reviewer Agreed is performed after SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in revision cycles
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to be followed by SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average waiting time to the SW-Reviewer Agreed following Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Agreed in complex reviewer assignment variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time for SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include multiple occurrences of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and the end of the case

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Manuscript Export Succeeded in accepted manuscript trajectories
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average time for SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name
Time of SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'aggregation': 'average'}"
